snippet: An ad that shows interview excerpts in which Mr. Trump argues that Planned Parenthood “serves a good function” could be the most potent signal yet that Mr. Cruz views the issue as a chief vulnerability for his rival in South Carolina.
abstract: An ad that shows interview excerpts in which Mr. Trump argues that Planned Parenthood “serves a good function” could be the most potent signal yet that Mr. Cruz views the issue as a chief vulnerability for his rival in South Carolina.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Attacks Donald Trump Over Planned Parenthood in New Ad
